title: Mind of the Virtuoso sheet music?
body: I absolutely loved the Mind of the Virtuoso teaser for Jhin and was wondering if there was any sheet music for the violin part. I also enjoyed playing the Kindred Eternal Hunters theme that a riot employee posted a while back, would it be possible to do the same with this one?{{champion:202}}

replies.body:
Hey Lestara Buvelle,

Thanks for liking Jhin's music and playing Kindred (both of which I wrote).

We're working on a more streamlined way to distribute sheet music to our players, so please stay tuned! We may release Jhin's sheet music ahead of that, but I couldn't say when.

It has been a year since you all made this. Any updates on releasing sheet music? I saw the Kled, and Tahm one with a couple others, but this one particularly sticks out to me and would love to see the sheet music!

> [{quoted}](name=41619,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ahAt3KpE,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-02T22:36:49.631+0000)
>
> It has been a year since you all made this. Any updates on releasing sheet music? I saw the Kled, and Tahm one with a couple others, but this one particularly sticks out to me and would love to see the sheet music!

Hoping to be able to release this soon! Keep your eyes peeled!
Are we gonna see another blog post about the music on League then?

> [{quoted}](name=Spideraxe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ahAt3KpE,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-03T12:04:37.117+0000)
>
> Are we gonna see another blog post about the music on League then?

I'm truly hoping so!
Let me guess : You want it , but there are copyright problems?

> [{quoted}](name=KNTE Lukas,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ahAt3KpE,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-04T01:11:38.751+0000)
>
> Let me guess : You want it , but there are copyright problems?

Nope! All of our music (with very, very few exceptions) belongs to same entity and copyright isn't an issue.

Well can you at least tell us what song y'all have been using in the Champion Spotlights recently? You know right when the Skills start to get broken down and its a wonderful piece that i would like to hear. It sounds so close to the experience on the the Rift. Also its my type of Music! :)

Hey M8!
I dont know if ur still interested but here is what u want :) https://musescore.com/user/113601/scores/1703426
Greetings
